text.div:
Data Types

Code Description Comment Version
AD Address Replaced by XAD as of v 2.3 added v2.4
AUI Authorization information Replaces the CM data type used in sections 6.5.6.14 IN1-14, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
CCD Charge code and date Replaces the CM data type used in section 4.5.2.1 BLG-1, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
CCP Channel calibration parameters Replaces the CM data type used in 7.14.1.5 OBX-5.3 where OBX-5Observation value (*) is data type CD as of v 2.5. added v2.5
CD Channel definition For waveform data only;. added v2.4
CE Coded element WITHDRAWN added v2.4
CF Coded element with formatted values 65536 added v2.4
CK Composite ID with check digit WITHDRAWN added v2.4
CM Composite WITHDRAWN Replaced by numerous new unambiguous data types in v 2.5 added v2.4
CN Composite ID number and name WITHDRAWN. Replaced by XCN as of v 2.3 added v2.4
CNE Coded with no exceptions 705 added v2.4
CNN Composite ID number and name simplified Restores the original data type CN as was initially implementable in the CM used in sections 4.5.3.32 and 7.4.1.32-(OBR-32), 4.5.3.33 and 7.4.1.33 - (OBR-33) 4.5.3.34 and 7.4.1.34 - (OBR-34) 4.5.3.35 and 7.4.1.35 - (OBR-35). Components 7 and 8, however, have been promoted to data type IS to be consistent with current practice without violating backward compatibility. added v2.7
CNS Composite ID number and name simplified deprecated added v2.5, removed after v2.6
CP Composite price . added v2.4
CQ Composite quantity with units CQ cannot be legally expressed when embedded within another data type. Its use is constrained to a segment field. added v2.4
CSU Channel sensitivity and units Replaces the CM data type used in 7.14.1.5 OBX-5.3 where OBX-5Observation value (*) is data type CD as of v 2.5. added v2.5
CWE Coded with exceptions 705 added v2.4
CX Extended composite ID with check digit 1913 added v2.4
DDI Daily deductible information Replaces the CM data type used in section 6.5.7.30 IN2-30, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
DIN Date and institution name Replaces the CM data type used in sections 15.4.6.12 STF-12 and 15.4.6.14 STF-13, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
DLD Discharge to location and date Replaces the CM data type used in section 8.8.4.9 - OM2-9, as of v 2.5 added v2.5
DLN Driver's license number 66 added v2.4
DLT Delta 45 added v2.5
DR Date/time range 53 added v2.4
DT Date 8 added v2.4
DTM Date/time 24 added v2.5
DTN Day type and number Replaces the CM data type used in section 6.5.8.11 IN3-11, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
ED Encapsulated data Supports ASCII MIME-encoding of binary data. added v2.4
EI Entity identifier 427 added v2.4
EIP Entity identifier pair Replaces the CM data type used in sections 4.5.1.8 - ORC-8, 4.5.3.29 - OBR-29, 7.3.1.29 - OBR-29, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
ELD Error location and description WITHDRAWN added v2.5
ERL Error location 18 added v2.5
FC Financial class 47 added v2.4
FN Family name Appears ONLY in the PPN, XCN, and XPN. added v2.4
FT Formatted text 65536 added v2.4
GTS General timing specification 199 added v2.5
HD Hierarchic designator 227 added v2.4
ICD Insurance certification definition Replaces the CM data type used in section 6.5.8.20 IN3-20, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
ID Coded values for HL7 tables Variable added v2.4
IS Coded value for user-defined tables 20 added v2.4
JCC Job code/class 292 added v2.4
LA1 Location with address variation 1 Replaces the CM data type used in 4.14.1.8 RXO-8 and 4.14.4.8 RXE-8 as of v 2.5. Retained for backward compatibility only as of v 2.5 added v2.5
LA2 Location with address variation 2 Replaces the CM data type used in 4.14.5.13 RXD-13, 4.14.6.11 RXG-11 and 4.14.7.11 RXA-11 as of v 2.5. Retained for backward compatibility only as of v 2.5, added v2.5
MA Multiplexed array For waveform data only added v2.4
MO Money 20 added v2.4
MOC Money and charge code Replaces the CM data type used in sections 4.5.3.23 OBR-23 and 7.4.1.23- OBR-23 as of v 2.5. added v2.5
MOP Money or percentage Replaces the CM data type used in section 6.5.8.5 IN3-5, as of v 2.5. This data type is restricted to this field. added v2.5
MSG Message type Replaces the CM data type used in 2.16.9.9 MSH-9 as of v 2.5. added v2.5
NA Numeric array For waveform data only added v2.4
NDL Name with date and location Replaces the CM data type used in sections 4.5.3.32 and 7.4.1.32-( OBR-32) , 4.5.3.33 and 7.4.1.33 - ( OBR-33) 4.5.3.34 and 7.4.1.34 - ( OBR-34) 4.5.3.35 and 7.4.1.35 - ( OBR-35) as of v 2.5. added v2.5
NM Numeric 16 added v2.4
NR Numeric range Replaces the CM data type used in sections 8.8.4.6.1- OM2-6.1, 8.8.4.6.3- OM2-6.3and 8.8.4.6.4- OM2-6.4, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
OCD Occurrence code and date Replaces the CM data type used in sections 6.5.10.10 UB1-16 and 6.5.11.7 UB2-7, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
OSD Order sequence definition WITHDRAWN added v2.5
OSP Occurrence span code and date Replaces the CM data type used in section 6.5.11.8 UB2-8, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
PIP Practitioner institutional privileges Replaces the CM data type used in 15.4.5.7 PRA-7 as of v 2.5. added v2.5
PL Person location 1230 added v2.4
PLN Practitioner license or other ID number Replaces the CM data type used in 15.4.5.6 PRA-6, 11.6.3.7 PRD-7 and 11.6.4.7 CTD-7 as of v 2.5. added v2.5
PN Person name WITHDRAWN added v2.4
PPN Performing person time stamp equivalent of an XCN joined with a TS added v2.4
PRL Parent result link Replaces the CM data type used in sections 4.5.3.26 - OBR-26 and 7.4.1.26 - OBR-26 as of v 2.5. added v2.5
PT Processing type 3 added v2.4
PTA Policy type and amount Replaces the CM data type used in section 6.5.7.29 IN2-29, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
QIP Query input parameter list 212 added v2.4
QSC Query selection criteria 219 added v2.4
RCD Row column definition 19 added v2.4
RFR Reference range Replaces the CM data type used in sections 8.8.4.6 - OM2-6, 8.8.4.7 - OM2-7 and8.8.4.8 - OM2-8 as of v 2.5. added v2.5
RI Repeat interval 206 added v2.4
RMC Room coverage Replaces the CM data type used in section 6.5.7.28 IN2-28, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
RP Reference pointer 273 added v2.4
RPT Repeat pattern 984 added v2.5
SAD Street Address Appears ONLY in the XAD data type. added v2.4
SCV Scheduling class value pair For scheduling data only. See Chapter 10 added v2.4
SI Sequence ID 4 added v2.4
SN Structured numeric 36 added v2.4
SNM String of telephone number digits Definition: a string whose characters are limited to "+" and the decimal digits 0 through 9. As a string, leading zeros are always considered significant. Maximum length: Not specified for the type. May be specified in the context of use. added v2.7
SPD Specialty description Replaces the CM data type used in 15.4.5.5 PRA-5 as of v 2.5. added v2.5
SPS Specimen source WITHDRAWN added v2.5
SRT Sort order 15 added v2.4
ST String data 199 added v2.4
TM Time 16 added v2.4
TN Telephone number WITHDRAWN added v2.4
TQ Timing/quantity WITHDRAWN added v2.4
TS Time stamp WITHDRAWN added v2.4
TX Text data 65536 added v2.4
UVC UB value code and amount Replaces the CM data type used in sections 6.5.10.10 UB1-10 and 6.5.11.6 UB2-6, as of v 2.5. added v2.5
VH Visiting hours 41 added v2.4
VID Version identifier 973 added v2.4
VR Value range Replaces the CM data type used in 5.10.5.3.11 QRD-11 as of v 2.5. added v2.5
WVI Channel Identifier Replaces the CM data type used in 7.14.1.3.1 OBX-5.1 where OBX-5 Observation value (*) is data type CD as of v 2.5. added v2.5
WVS Waveform source Replaces the CM data type used in 7.14.1.4 OBX-5.2 where OBX-5 Observation value (*) is data type CD as of v 2.5. added v2.5
XAD Extended address Replaces AD as of v 2.3 added v2.4
XCN Extended composite ID number and name for persons Replaces CN as of v 2.3 added v2.4
XON Extended composite name and ID number for organizations 567 added v2.4
XPN Extended person name Replaces PN as of v 2.3. added v2.4
XTN Extended telecommunications number Replaces TN as of v 2.3 added v2.4

name: v2.0440
title: v2 Data types
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0440 ( Data types)

property.description: A property that indicates the status of the concept. One of active, experimental, deprecated, retired
The date at which a concept was deprecated. Concepts that are deprecated but not inactive can still be used, but their use is discouraged

extension.valueString: Replaced by XAD as of v 2.3
Vervangen door XAD vanaf v2.3
Replaces the CM data type used in sections 6.5.6.14 IN1-14, as of v 2.5.
Vervangt het datatype CM uit sectie 6.5.6.14 IN1-14 vanaf v2.5
Replaces the CM data type used in section 4.5.2.1 BLG-1, as of v 2.5.
Vervangt het datatype CM uit sectie 4.5.2.1 BLG-1 vanaf v2.5
Replaces the CM data type used in 7.14.1.5 OBX-5.3 where OBX-5Observation value (*) is data type CD as of v 2.5.
Vervangt het datatype CM uit sectie 7.14.1.5 OBX-5.3 vanaf v2.5 als OBX-5 Observation value (*) datatype CD heeft.
For waveform data only;.
Alleen voor waveform gegevens
WITHDRAWN
VERVALLEN

designation.value: Gecodeerd element met waarden met opmaak

extension.valueString: WITHDRAWN
VERVALLEN
WITHDRAWN Replaced by numerous new unambiguous data types in v 2.5
VERVALLEN Vervangen door vele nieuwe niet-ambigue datatypen in v2.5
WITHDRAWN. Replaced by XCN as of v 2.3
VERVALLEN Vervangen door XCN vanaf v2.3

Restores the original data type CN as was initially implementable in the CM used in sections 4.5.3.32 and 7.4.1.32-(OBR-32), 4.5.3.33 and 7.4.1.33 - (OBR-33) 4.5.3.34 and 7.4.1.34 - (OBR-34) 4.5.3.35 and 7.4.1.35 - (OBR-35). Components 7 and 8, however, have been promoted to data type IS to be consistent with current practice without violating backward compatibility.

Brengt het oude datatype CN terug zoals oorspronkelijk implementeerbaar was in de CM van secties 4.5.3.32 en 7.4.1.32 (OBR-32), 4.5.3.33 en 7.4.1.33 (OBR-33) 4.5.3.34 en 7.4.1.34 (OBR-34) 4.5.3.35 en 7.4.1.35 (OBR-35). Componenten 7 en 8 zijn echter gepromoveerd tot datatype IS om consistent te zijn met de huidige praktijk zonder backward compatibiliteit te schaden.

concept.display: Composite ID number and name simplified
Composite ID number and name simplified

extension.valueString: CQ cannot be legally expressed when embedded within another data type. Its use is constrained to a segment field.
CQ kan niet correct worden uitgedrukt binnen een ander datatype. Het kan alleen worden gebruikt in een segmentveld.
Replaces the CM data type used in 7.14.1.5 OBX-5.3 where OBX-5Observation value (*) is data type CD as of v 2.5.
Vervangt het CM datatype gebruikt in sectie 7.14.1.5 OBX-5-3 vanaf v2.5 waarbij OBX-5 Observation value (*) het datatype CD heeft.
